com.smartitengineering.exim
Interface AssociationConfig

All Known Implementing Classes:
AssociationConfigImpl
public interface AssociationConfig

A configuration API for all association in an exim-able object. Since in Java all types are of type Object we will considering every member (a field or a property) an association and thus store a configuration for it.

Since:
0.4
Author:
imyousuf

Nested Class Summary
static class AssociationConfig.AssociationType
          It defimes types that impacts how the data is used in order to be exported.
 
Method Summary
 AssociationConfig.AssociationType getAssociationType()
          Defines the type of association this configuration represents
 java.lang.String getName()
          Defines the name representing the association in the exported doc.
 boolean isEagerSet()
          Defines whether the object should be imported eagerly or on demand.
 boolean isItToBeExportedAsUri()
          Defines whether the associate is to be exported as URI or not.
 boolean isStringProviderImplemented()
          Defines whether the association has its own string value generator implementation, (if its not exported as URI) if it does have a provider then it will be used else toString will be used.
 boolean isTransient()
          Defines whether the association is to be ignored for when the domain is exported or imported.
 

Method Detail

isItToBeExportedAsUri

boolean isItToBeExportedAsUri()
Defines whether the associate is to be exported as URI or not.

Returns:
True if its expected to export as URI else false

isTransient

boolean isTransient()
Defines whether the association is to be ignored for when the domain is exported or imported.

Returns:
True if it is to be ignored for Ex-Im.

isEagerSet

boolean isEagerSet()
Defines whether the object should be imported eagerly or on demand. It will only be supported if the resource is exported using properties. If any association config has it set then it will use CGLIB for proxying the resources.

Returns:
True if association is to be fetched eagerly.
See Also:
isItToBeExportedAsUri(), isTransient()

getName

java.lang.String getName()
Defines the name representing the association in the exported doc.

Returns:
Name to be used in export/import; if null then field/property name will be used instead.

isStringProviderImplemented

boolean isStringProviderImplemented()
Defines whether the association has its own string value generator implementation, (if its not exported as URI) if it does have a provider then it will be used else toString will be used.

Returns:
True if it has a string provider implemented.
See Also:
isItToBeExportedAsUri()

getAssociationType

AssociationConfig.AssociationType getAssociationType()
Defines the type of association this configuration represents

Returns:
Type of the associaiton
